author: Angad Dhillon
title: Racket not running tests
question: My Racket is not running any tests for me.... When I press run, nothing happens. It was working fine a few minutes ago. Now I got this message from Racket:
student_answer: After you hit run, is the guy in the bottom right corner running or standing still (before you get this error message)? If the guy is seen as running, what's happening is the tests are running but somewhere in your code there is an infinite loop.
